name: Flagsplosion (itch)
description:
A Flag Identifying Endless Quizzer

With over 600 current flags from around the world, 100 Training levels, Practice Mode, and Endless Mode

Training Mode:

100 levels with five minigames. Play through this mode to get familiar with the flags and to unlock flags in Practice.

Practice Mode:

Non-timed and relaxed, play at your own speed. Use this mode to learn the flags and prepare for the ultimate challenge: Endless.

Endless Mode:

The ultimate challenge, timed and endless. Each flag you get correct increases your score. How high of a score can you reach?
